title: Offer Creation for SD LAN/WiFi
description:
Description
  For whom SSE/Sales
who want to make an offer to the customer
provides Information about requested product
to configure the product and create an customer offer
Different from Manual processes
optimizing process costs, process speed, transparency by simplification and automation
Hypothesis for the business result Getting an offer fast and automated process
Non functional requirements  

Business Scope:
For the LAN/WiFi product seller or SSE need to create an offer. The offer should be automated via CPQ. The processes should be as closed as possible to SD WAN.
acceptance_criteria: Product can be configured via CPQ
Offer will be created non-binding and sales report
